Job Title: Merchandiser

Location: Colorado Springs, CO

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Customer Service, Sales

Description:
Who is Swire Coca-Cola?  We are one of the largest bottlers of Coca-Cola and other beverage brands in America. Our 7,200 hardworking and passionate employees produce and distribute more than 50 brands and flavors across 13 states. We have as many careers as we have flavors, and regardless of which role you choose, you have a direct impact on Swire Coca-Cola, our products, and the communities we call home.

 What does a Merchandiser do at Swire Coca-Cola? 

In this role, you will be responsible for ensuring customer satisfaction and promoting our product portfolio by keeping beverage sections, displays, coolers and all points of inventory properly stocked and in accordance to Swire Coca-Cola standards.

Click here for a Day in the Life of Video  (If link does not work, please copy and paste the following into your browser: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IxoB4d8WBSE)

 Responsibilities: 

 Restock displays, sections, racks, coolers and shelves in an aligned manner  Build displays and other promotional items throughout the assigned store  Maintain backrooms by organizing and consolidating back stock in a safely accessible way  Set aside and store in backroom any product unfit for sale  Operate powered equipment (ex: powered pallet jack) and manual equipment  Clean and organize shelves or aisles each day to provide a safe environment for consumers 

 Requirements:

 Must be at least 18 years of age  Driving record must meet Swire’s vehicle policy requirements  Work weekends and holidays as directed by the business  Lift up to 50 pounds as needed 

 Why Join Our Team? 

 Mileage Reimbursement  Local routes – Allowing you to stay close to home and represent an international brand in your community  Flexible schedule – Variety of shift start times based on your availability to accommodate your schedule 

Base pay rate is $19.25 plus bonus structure (dependent on role) . Pay offered will depend on candidate’s geographic location, prior relevant experience, knowledge, skills, & abilities.

At Swire Coca-Cola, we offer a comprehensive benefits package for full-time associates. Benefit options include: Medical, Dental, Vision, Pharmacy, Medical FSA, Dependent Care FSA, Health Savings Account, Life Insurance, Supplemental Life Insurance, Accidental Death & Dismemberment Insurance, Short-Term Disability Insurance, Long-Term Disability Insurance, Accident Insurance, Critical Illness Insurance, Employee Assistance Program, Telehealth, Virtual Mental Health Counseling, 401(k) with Company Match, Paid Vacation, Paid Sick Time, Paid Holidays, Maternity Disability Paid Leave, Parental Paid Leave, and Tuition Reimbursement.

Swire Coca-Cola is an equal employment opportunity and affirmative action employer that participates in the E-Verify program as required by law. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, Veteran status or other legally protected characteristics.

Apply Now

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
